trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará um evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> evento ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> está definida ou seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> é de propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: Quando você processa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> evento, o menu de atalho que você especificar o manipulador é mostrado sempre que o usuário clica uma célula.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display shortcut menus determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando você deseja exibir menus de atalho, determinados pelo estado atual ou valor de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> evento também ocorre sempre que o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade é recuperada, ou programaticamente ou quando o usuário clica na célula.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> propriedades para determinar o estado ou o valor de uma célula e use essas informações para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é inicializada com o valor da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> propriedade, que substitui o valor do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> eventos ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar as penalidades de desempenho de definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> valor para várias células.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar os menus de atalho para linhas individuais em vez de células individuais, definindo a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> propriedade ou manipulação de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> evento.

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: A célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> configuração da propriedade substitui a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> configuração de propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> substituições de evento de ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> evento e a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> configuração da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar `null` para um menu de atalho célula, no entanto, para impedir que um menu de atalho da linha que está sendo substituído.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs> to set the context menu without unsharing the row.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs> para definir o menu de contexto sem descompartilhar a linha.
